column3: evidence of the defence in  the High Court and the defence of alibi .

column4: On  perusal  of the  learned  High Court Judge's judgment we

column3: find  that the  learned  High  Court Judge  has  analysed  the  defence
evidence when arriving at his finding .

column4: For the afore stated  reasons we decide that this court is not

column3: inclined  to  set  aside  a  well  considered  judgment.  Judgment  and
